Title.title: Title
Title.description: Text shown in the top left corner when the app opens

Logo.title: Custom Logo
Logo.description: Path to the logo shown in the top right corner when the app opens. Scales to 48 points maximum height

LogoDarkMode.title: Custom Logo Dark Mode
LogoDarkMode.description: Path to the logo shown in the top right corner when the app opens for Dark Mode. Scales to 48 points maximum height

StatusBarIcon.title: Custom Status Bar Icon
StatusBarIcon.description: Path to the status bar icon shown in the menu bar. Recommended: PNG, 16x16 points

StatusBarIconSFSymbol.title: Custom Status Bar Icon using SF Symbols
StatusBarIconSFSymbol.description: Custom status bar icon using an SF Symbol. Ignored when StatusBarIcon is also set

StatusBarIconNotifierEnabled.title: Notification badge in Status Bar Icon
StatusBarIconNotifierEnabled.description: Shows a small notification badge in the Status Bar Icon when there is an Apple Software Update available or when the UptimeDaysLimit or PasswordExpiryLimit is reached

UpdateText.title: Update Text
UpdateText.description: Optional text to shown in the macOS Managed Updates popover to tell users about the updates

CustomColor.title: Custom Color
CustomColor.description: HEX color in RGB format. Example: #8cc63f. Leave empty to use macOS Accent Color

CustomColorDarkMode.title: Custom Color Dark Mode
CustomColorDarkMode.description: HEX color in RGB format for Dark Mode. Example: #8cc63f. CustomColor is used when CustomColorDarkMode is not specified

HideFirstRowInfoItems.title: Hide first row Info Items
HideFirstRowInfoItems.description: Hide the first row with Info Items

HideSecondRowInfoItems.title: Hide second row Info Items
HideSecondRowInfoItems.description: Hide the second row with Info Items

HideThirdRowInfoItems.title: Hide third row Info Items
HideThirdRowInfoItems.description: Hide the third row with Info Items

HideFirstRowButtons.title: Hide first row configurable buttons
HideFirstRowButtons.description: Hide the first row with configurable items

HideSecondRowButtons.title: Hide second row configurable buttons
HideSecondRowButtons.description: Hide the second row with configurable items

ErrorMessage.title: Custom error message
ErrorMessage.description: Shown when clicking an action results in an error

ShowWelcomeScreen.title: Welcome Screen
ShowWelcomeScreen.description: A welcome screen and feature explanation to show when the app is first opened

FooterText.title: Footer text
FooterText.description: Shown at the bottom as footnote. Supports both text and Emoji. Markdown is supported for macOS Monterey and higher

OpenAtLogin.title: Automatically Support (non-PKG) at login
OpenAtLogin.description: Disabled by default. Launch Support (non-PKG) automatically at login and keep it open (macOS 13 and higher). This setting is ignored if a legacy LaunchAgent is installed/active. Keep disabled if you don't want to open Support at login or use your own LaunchAgent

InfoItemOne.title: Info item 1st tile
InfoItemOne.description: Info item shown in the upper left corner

InfoItemTwo.title: Info item 2nd tile
InfoItemTwo.description: Info item shown in the upper right corner

InfoItemThree.title: Info item 3rd tile
InfoItemThree.description: Info item shown in the second row left

InfoItemFour.title: Info item 4th tile
InfoItemFour.description: Info item shown in the second row right

InfoItemFive.title: Info item 5th tile
InfoItemFive.description: Info item shown in the third row left

InfoItemSix.title: Info item 6th tile
InfoItemSix.description: Info item shown in the third row right

UptimeDaysLimit.title: Maximum uptime in days
UptimeDaysLimit.description: Days of uptime after which a notification badge is shown

StorageLimit.title: Maximum used storage percentage
StorageLimit.description: Percentage of storage after which a notification badge is shown

PasswordExpiryLimit.title: Maximum password expiry in days
PasswordExpiryLimit.description: Days until password expiry after which a notification badge is shown

PasswordType.title: Password type
PasswordType.description: Password expiry information source: Apple (local account or AD), Jamf Connect or Kerberos SSO Extension

PasswordLabel.title: Password item label
PasswordLabel.description: Alternative text label shown in the Password info item

FirstRowTitleLeft.title: First Row Left: Title
FirstRowTitleLeft.description: The text shown in the button label

FirstRowSubtitleLeft.title: First Row Left: Subtitle
FirstRowSubtitleLeft.description: Subtitle text will appear under title when the user hovers over the button. Ignored if left empty.

FirstRowTypeLeft.title: First Row Left: Type
FirstRowTypeLeft.description: Type of link the item should open. Can be anything like screen sharing tools, company stores, file servers or core applications in your organization. App by default.

FirstRowLinkLeft.title: First Row Left: Link
FirstRowLinkLeft.description: The Bundle Identifier of the app, link, command or path to script

FirstRowSymbolLeft.title: First Row Left: SF Symbol name
FirstRowSymbolLeft.description: The SF Symbol shown in the button

FirstRowTitleMiddle.title: First Row Middle: Title
FirstRowTitleMiddle.description: The text shown in the button label

FirstRowSubtitleMiddle.title: First Row Middle: Subtitle
FirstRowSubtitleMiddle.description: Subtitle text will appear under title when the user hovers over the button. Ignored if left empty.

FirstRowTypeMiddle.title: First Row Middle: Type
FirstRowTypeMiddle.description: Type of link the item should open. Can be anything like screen sharing tools, company stores, file servers or core applications in your organization. App by default.

FirstRowLinkMiddle.title: First Row Middle: Link
FirstRowLinkMiddle.description: The Bundle Identifier of the app, link, command or path to script

FirstRowSymbolMiddle.title: First Row Middle: SF Symbol name
FirstRowSymbolMiddle.description: The SF Symbol shown in the button

FirstRowTitleRight.title: First Row Right: Title
FirstRowTitleRight.description: The text shown in the button label.

FirstRowSubtitleRight.title: First Row Right: Subtitle
FirstRowSubtitleRight.description: Subtitle text will appear under title when the user hovers over the button. Ignored if left empty.

FirstRowTypeRight.title: First Row Right: Type
FirstRowTypeRight.description: Type of link the item should open. Can be anything like screen sharing tools, company stores, file servers or core applications in your organization. App by default.

FirstRowLinkRight.title: First Row Right: Link
FirstRowLinkRight.description: The Bundle Identifier of the app, link, command or path to script

FirstRowSymbolRight.title: First Row Right: SF Symbol name
FirstRowSymbolRight.description: The SF Symbol shown in the button.

SecondRowTitleLeft.title: Second Row Left: Title
SecondRowTitleLeft.description: The text shown in the button label.

SecondRowSubtitleLeft.title: Second Row Left: Subtitle
SecondRowSubtitleLeft.description: Subtitle text will replace the title when the user hovers over the button. Ignored if left empty.

SecondRowTypeLeft.title: Second Row Left: Type
SecondRowTypeLeft.description: Type of link the item should open. Can be anything like screen sharing tools, company stores, file servers or core applications in your organization. URL by default.

SecondRowLinkLeft.title: Second Row Left: Link
SecondRowLinkLeft.description: The Bundle Identifier of the app, link, command or path to script.

SecondRowSymbolLeft.title: Second Row Left: SF Symbol name
SecondRowSymbolLeft.description: The SF Symbol shown in the button.

SecondRowTitleMiddle.title: Second Row Middle: Title
SecondRowTitleMiddle.description: The text shown in the button label.

SecondRowSubtitleMiddle.title: Second Row Middle: Subtitle
SecondRowSubtitleMiddle.description: Subtitle text will replace the title when the user hovers over the button. Ignored if left empty.

SecondRowTypeMiddle.title: Second Row Middle: Type
SecondRowTypeMiddle.description: Type of link the item should open. Can be anything like screen sharing tools, company stores, file servers or core applications in your organization. URL by default.

SecondRowLinkMiddle.title: Second Row Middle: Link
SecondRowLinkMiddle.description: The Bundle Identifier of the app, link, command or path to script.

SecondRowSymbolMiddle.title: Second Row Middle: SF Symbol name
SecondRowSymbolMiddle.description: The SF Symbol shown in the button.

SecondRowTitleRight.title: Second Row Right: Title
SecondRowTitleRight.description: The text shown in the button label.

SecondRowSubtitleRight.title: Second Row Right: Subtitle
SecondRowSubtitleRight.description: Subtitle text will replace the title when the user hovers over the button. Ignored if left empty.

SecondRowTypeRight.title: Second Row Right: Type
SecondRowTypeRight.description: Type of link the item should open. Can be anything like screen sharing tools, company stores, file servers or core applications in your organization. URL by default.

SecondRowLinkRight.title: Second Row Right: Link
SecondRowLinkRight.description: The Bundle Identifier of the app, link, command or path to script.

SecondRowSymbolRight.title: Second Row Right: SF Symbol name
SecondRowSymbolRight.description: The SF Symbol shown in the button.

ExtensionTitleA.title: Extension Title A
ExtensionTitleA.description: The text shown in the Extension.

ExtensionValueA.title: Extension Value A
ExtensionValueA.description: The value shown in the Extension as subtitle.

ExtensionSymbolA.title: Extension SF Symbol A
ExtensionSymbolA.description: The SF Symbol shown in the Extension.

ExtensionTypeA.title: Extension Link Type A
ExtensionTypeA.description: Type of link the Extension should open.

ExtensionLinkA.title: Extension Link A
ExtensionLinkA.description: The Bundle Identifier of the app, link, command or path to script.

ExtensionAlertA.title: Extension Alert A
ExtensionAlertA.description: Enable an alert notification badge in Extension A

ExtensionTitleB.title: Extension Title B
ExtensionTitleB.description: The text shown in the Extension.

ExtensionValueB.title: Extension Value B
ExtensionValueB.description: The value shown in the Extension as subtitle.

ExtensionSymbolB.title: Extension SF Symbol B
ExtensionSymbolB.description: The SF Symbol shown in the Extension.

ExtensionTypeB.title: Extension Link Type B
ExtensionTypeB.description: Type of link the Extension should open

ExtensionLinkB.title: Extension Link B
ExtensionLinkB.description: The Bundle Identifier of the app, link, command or path to script.

ExtensionAlertB.title: Extension Alert B
ExtensionAlertB.description: Enable an alert notification badge in Extension B

OnAppearAction.title: On Appear Action
OnAppearAction.description: Path to privileged script to be executed when the Support App is shown by clicking on the menu bar item. The Privileged Helper Tool is required for this feature.

DisablePrivilegedHelperTool.title: Enable or Disable Privileged Helper Tool
DisablePrivilegedHelperTool.description: Option to enable or disable the Privileged Helper Tool. Re-enabling requires the reinstallation of the Support App.
